divs: Sighting DetailsWas looking up at the sky one night and saw something moving high in the sky ithad several colors, as I watched it the object suddenly stopped traveled back inthe direction it had come from and then stopped and went back in the originaltravel diretion and then up and out of site with great speed. The entiresighting was less than 30 seconds and the final direction change resulted inextreme speed.The shape was not listed in your choices above but I would say that is resembleda small comet. The thing the stuck me as odd other than the colors was the zformation that it flew.I have chosen not to include my telephone number, if this poses a problem thenso be it.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Tomah
There were no other sightings in Tomah on or around November 30th 1984
